verses.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Blessed is the man that feareth the LORD, that delighteth greatly in his commandments.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD! How happy is the person who is wholeheartedly dedicated to the LORD, who finds great joy in his commands.

verses.kjv: His seed shall be mighty upon earth: the generation of the upright shall be blessed.
verses.ct: Their descendants will be powerful in the land; the children of the godly will be blessed.

verses.kjv: Wealth and riches shall be in his house: and his righteousness endureth for ever.
verses.ct: Prosperity and abundance will fill their home, and their righteousness lasts forever.

verses.kjv: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness: he is gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.
verses.ct: Even in dark times, light dawns for those who live with integrity â€” for the one who is generous, compassionate, and righteous.

verses.kjv: A good man sheweth favour, and lendeth: he will guide his affairs with discretion.
verses.ct: It goes well for the person who is generous and lends freely; they manage their business with good judgment.

verses.kjv: Surely he shall not be moved for ever: the righteous shall be in everlasting remembrance.
verses.ct: They will never be shaken; the righteous will be remembered forever.

verses.kjv: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the LORD.
verses.ct: They won't be terrified by bad news; their heart is steady because they trust in the LORD.

verses.kjv: His heart is established, he shall not be afraid, until he see his desire upon his enemies.
verses.ct: Their heart is secure and unafraid, and in the end they will see the downfall of their enemies.

verses.kjv: He hath dispersed, he hath given to the poor; his righteousness endureth for ever; his horn shall be exalted with honour.
verses.ct: They give generously to those in need; their righteousness lasts forever; they will be lifted up in honor.

verses.kjv: The wicked shall see it, and be grieved; he shall gnash with his teeth, and melt away: the desire of the wicked shall perish.
verses.ct: The wicked will watch this and be furious; they will grind their teeth and waste away. Everything the wicked hope for will come to nothing.
